item.description:
No set agenda except to fulfill our Human and Divine natures through open, honest, loving, sincere, and humble exchanges of thoughts, feelings, and ideas concerning the energetic/spiritual dimensions of our existence and our world. The process of healing is really the process of revealing the Divine Pattern that already lies within. It is not religious but natural and harmonizes with any spiritual path on which you travel, including atheism. Energy healing is a manifestation of Consciousness, of the Universal I AM. Therefore, to search, study, and practice the realm of energy healing is to explore the dimensions of Consciousness.

The Truth I Seek I AM......
item.how_to_find_us: Enter code: #-0-6-1 in the lobby intercom and I will ring you in......3rd floor.
item.why: You have your own reasons for joining us.....you are prompted from within to pursue your spiritual evolution and explore the inner/outer reaches of healing & Consciousness and/or you have a sense of your true nature.
item.name: Genesis
